info.title: Kie Server API
info.description: All endpoints that can be used with the Kie Server

get.summary: Retrieves KIE Server information - id, name, location, capabilities, messages

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: optional case instance status (open, closed, canceled) - defaults ot open (1) only

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: optional pagination - at which page to start, defaults to 0 (meaning first)

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: optional pagination - size of the result, defaults to 10

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: optional sort column, no default

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: optional sort direction (asc, desc) - defaults to asc

get.summary: Retrieves case instances without authntication checks and applies pagination

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: optional pagination - size of the result, defaults to 10

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: optional sort column, no default

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: optional sort direction (asc, desc) - defaults to asc
